title: SBT GRVL Co-Founder Amy Charity on the Future of Gravel | Velo Podcast
content:
Running one of gravel's marquee events has put Amy Charity at the center of the discipline's meteoric rise and growing pains.

Read the full article at SBT GRVL Co-Founder Amy Charity on the Future of Gravel | Velo Podcast on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
